Node._text: How dare YOU-! You..- You and your…’people’, how DARE you let them violate my privacy with their- their-!\nThis never would’ve happened if [insert old landlord name here] was still around!
You. It was you, wasn’t it! Don’t think I don’t notice you eyeing my oranges with your greedy, little eyes-!
Heavens, no, are you daft?! A rotten thief has violated my sanctuary, and as your most valued tenant I demand justice. Chop chop.
Did someone-- NO! My tree! Just look at it! A thief has stripped my poor baby bare! How could someone be so cruel...! I’ll tear their fucking head off!
A thief…? That's impossible, Ms Teacup, everyone here is so nice!
Don’t be daft! Have you even spoken to any of these hoodlums more than twice in your whole life?
Mr. Deer tells me to go play in the street a lot.
(scoffs)\nWhy do I waste my time... You’re all so useless! None of you possess the strength of character to aid me in my time of need...
Oh… Don’t be upset Ms Teacup, I’ll help you find your oranges, just you watch! I’ll be your hero!

… “My hero”...? He’s starting to sound like...- bah, nevermind... It’s none of your business anyway...\n[Default]/nHuh-?! You can’t expect me to concentrate on your silly rent money at a time like this! Not until I get my oranges back for heaven’s sake! Shoo, shoo!
